SEARCH
Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.handlers.files

Class PictureHandler

java.lang.Object
com.glamdring.greenZenith.handlers.files.PictureHandler
public class PictureHandler extends Object
Handles the internal control and transformations of different image files.
Since:
0.1
Version:
0.0.1

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PictureHandler()
    Constructs the Picture handler object and asigns the default images a value depending on the image chosen within the proyect files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BufferedImage
    convertBlobToBufferedImage(Blob blobImage)
    Converts any blob to a usable image object.
    String
    convertBufferedImageToBase64(BufferedImage bufferedImage)
    Converts a usable image into a Base64 string for easier access and loading with web applications.
    Blob
    convertBufferedImageToBlob(BufferedImage bufferedImage, Connection connection)
    Converts any usable image object into a Binary Large Object, requires a connection to create BLOBs.
    BufferedImage
    getDEFAULT_PLANT()
    The default plant image is applied when a plant cannot resolve it's picture.
    BufferedImage
    getDEFAULT_PRODUCT()
    The default product image is applied when a product cannot resolve it's picture.
    BufferedImage
    getDEFAULT_TRUE()
    The default true is a placeholder image of 512x512 pixels that can be applied to all types of image data that don't have a defined image.
    BufferedImage
    getDEFAULT_USER()
    The default User image is applied when a User cannot resolve it's picture.

  • Constructor Details

    • PictureHandler

      public PictureHandler() throws IOException
      Constructs the Picture handler object and asigns the default images a value depending on the image chosen within the proyect files.
      Throws:
      IOException - If it cannot find the default images in the proyect.

  • Method Details

    • convertBlobToBufferedImage

      public BufferedImage convertBlobToBufferedImage(Blob blobImage)
      Converts any blob to a usable image object.
      Parameters:
      blobImage - A Binary Large Object from the database that represents an image file.
      Returns:
      The resulting image file in a usable format.

    • convertBufferedImageToBlob

      public Blob convertBufferedImageToBlob(BufferedImage bufferedImage, Connection connection)
      Converts any usable image object into a Binary Large Object, requires a connection to create BLOBs.
      Parameters:
      bufferedImage - The image to convert.
      connection - The connection that provides access to the creation of blobs.
      Returns:
      A Binary Large Object with the image file data.

    • convertBufferedImageToBase64

      public String convertBufferedImageToBase64(BufferedImage bufferedImage)
      Converts a usable image into a Base64 string for easier access and loading with web applications.
      Parameters:
      bufferedImage - The image to convert.
      Returns:
      A Base64 string that contains the image data.

    • getDEFAULT_USER

      public BufferedImage getDEFAULT_USER()
      The default User image is applied when a User cannot resolve it's picture.
      Returns:
      The default plant picture for any user.

    • getDEFAULT_PLANT

      public BufferedImage getDEFAULT_PLANT()
      The default plant image is applied when a plant cannot resolve it's picture.
      Returns:
      The default plant picture for any plant.

    • getDEFAULT_PRODUCT

      public BufferedImage getDEFAULT_PRODUCT()
      The default product image is applied when a product cannot resolve it's picture.
      Returns:
      The default product picture for any product.

    • getDEFAULT_TRUE

      public BufferedImage getDEFAULT_TRUE()
      The default true is a placeholder image of 512x512 pixels that can be applied to all types of image data that don't have a defined image.
      Returns:
      A placeholder that can be applied to everything.
